Title: Nursery Rhyme of a Madman
Writer: Igor Stephen Rados (screenplay), Stanislaw Witkiewitz (inspired by an idea from)
Actors: Peter Hodgins, Pola Stankovic, Tim Kachurov, Kieth Fernandes
Plot: An established poet is trapped in an asylum by two crazy doctors in competition over two schools of thought. He wants to write and create, but his hands are tied. The escape is a must. He ...
